options.optionText: She looks beautiful. Both of you.
options.responseText: You big sap. If you keep saying stuff like that, you'll turn me soft. Seriously though, I love you.

followUpOptions.responseText: Of course. Careful now—they're tiny. Watching you hold our kid… it's enough to melt me all over again.
Tired as hell, but weirdly… amazing. Holding our baby, seeing their little face—I never imagined feeling this much love.

followUpOptions.optionText: Is parenting as scary as they say?
followUpOptions.responseText: Scarier, but it's also better. Just promise you'll stay close—I think we can handle anything together.

followUpOptions.optionText: I didn't realize how emotional this would be.
followUpOptions.responseText: Right? Suddenly everything's different. And I wouldn’t trade these feelings for anything.

followUpOptions.optionText: You're gonna be an amazing mom.
followUpOptions.responseText: You're killing me with kindness, babe. I'm honestly terrified, but hearing you say that makes it easier.

options.optionText: I promise I'll always protect you both.
options.responseText: I believe you. And that's why I'll follow you to the end of this damn vault and beyond.

options.optionText: I love you more than ever.
options.responseText: Now you're just trying to make me cry. I love you too, you stubborn, incredible pain in my ass.

options.optionText: I'll let you rest. Call me if you need anything.
options.responseText: Don't go too far. We miss you already.

auto_lines: Hey there, come meet your baby. Look at us—officially a family now.
